markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Red Queen](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1810)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 48

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 46

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Red Queen](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1810)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 41</row>

**Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +31, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +37, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +33, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +33, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +28, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +30

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +6

**Con** +5

**Int** +2

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +9
</row>

**Items**
ornate platinum and ruby jewelry worth 12,000 gp

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 42 

**Fort** +31 

**Ref** +33 

**Will** +29 

</row>

**HP** 335

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> Stinger only.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandible +35 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+19 slashing plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 3d8+19 piercing plus red ant venom

**Lead by Example** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The Red Queen Strikes a creature with a vicious display that inspires her allies. Allies who can see the Red Queen can use a reaction to Step or Stride to a space adjacent to an enemy, or to Strike.

**Practiced Subterfuge**   When the Red Queen makes a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48), she compares her result to the Will DC of each enemy within 30 feet to determine the effect against that enemy. On a critical success, the creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to all melee attacks, not just melee attacks from the Red Queen, until the end of her next turn.

**Red Ant Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 40 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 3d6 poison and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 4d6 poison and enfeebled 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 6d6 poison and enfeebled 3 (1 round)

</column>
name: Red Queen

text: Red Queen Recall Knowledge - Beast (Arcana, Nature): DC 48 Unspecific Lore : DC 46 Specific Lore : DC 43 Red Queen Source Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 41 Perception +30; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 60 feet Languages Common Skills Athletics +31, Deception +37, Diplomacy +33, Intimidation +33, Society +28, Survival +30 Str +9 Dex +6 Con +5 Int +2 Wis +6 Cha +9 Items ornate platinum and ruby jewelry worth 12,000 gp --- AC 42 Fort +31 Ref +33 Will +29 HP 335 Attack of Opportunity Reaction Stinger only. --- Speed 40 feet, climb 20 feet Melee Single Action mandible +35 (Magical, reach 10 feet), Damage 3d12+19 slashing plus Improved Grab Melee Single Action stinger +35 (Agile, Magical), Damage 3d8+19 piercing plus red ant venom Lead by Example Two Actions (Visual) Frequency once per day; Effect The Red Queen Strikes a creature with a vicious display that inspires her allies. Allies who can see the Red Queen can use a reaction to Step or Stride to a space adjacent to an enemy, or to Strike. Practiced Subterfuge When the Red Queen makes a Deception check to Feint, she compares her result to the Will DC of each enemy within 30 feet to determine the effect against that enemy. On a critical success, the creature is flat-footed to all melee attacks, not just melee attacks from the Red Queen, until the end of her next turn. Red Ant Venom (Poison) Saving Throw DC 40 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 4 rounds; Stage 1 3d6 poison and enfeebled 1 (1 round); Stage 2 4d6 poison and enfeebled 2 (1 round); Stage 3 6d6 poison and enfeebled 3 (1 round)
